MGM Resorts will abandon casino proposal in Brimfield

MGM is dropping plans for a $600 million resort casino in Brimfield, and will instead seek an alternate site in Western Mass., a source said. (Boston Globe)
  • 1/12/12 MGM promises 3,000 jobs at proposed resort

Bankrupt solar firm sells Devens plant

Evergreen Solar's shuttered solar panel manufacturing plant and the land it sits on has been sold for $8.53 million to a California company. (Boston Globe)
  • 3/13 Evergreen Solar seeks OK to abandon Devens plant

Eat and run -- a Boston Marathon diet

With about 20,000 entrants running the 26.2-mile course next month, top sports dietitians offer their advice on how to fuel a long-distance runner’s body.
  • Running tips from Bill Rogers  |  How to stay hydrated
  • Is running healthy?  |  Run less for a faster marathon?

Vt. prep school teacher was killed, coroner reports

The death of Melissa Jenkins, whose toddler was found Sunday alone but unharmed in her idling SUV, has been ruled a homicide. (AP)
  • Slain teacher remembered as having 'positive energy'
